Headline: #93 California/Dodge Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lawrence/Kimball
ShortDescription: SB 93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Kedzie, Montrose, Kimball and Foster due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Kimball.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Kedzie, Montrose, Kimball and Foster due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Kimball

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
